website_summaries.verdict: Offers basic speed and direction readings and provides windshield projection, but it also comes with some quality and functionality concerns.
pros: Easy to read during the daytime thanks to the nanotechnology that reduces glare and reflections
Reads speeds in miles per hour or kilometers per hour, provides compass, and has a speed warning
Turns on and off when you start and stop your car
cons: Some inaccurate readings have been reported
Owners have complained that it isn't too bright at night, even on low settings
Confusing instructions, and some units came with none at all

customer_reviews.title: NIce Head up Dispaly
customer_reviews.text: DODORO Heads Up Display came nicely packed without any damage. This heads-up display is equipped with 3.5-inch multi-color LED Screen and it displays the driving speed and driving direction and has got pretty good font-size and it supports auto and manual brightness adjustment. Unlike other Heads up display which will collect the data using OBD2, this Heads up display gets the information from the built-in GPS. And this device is powered by the cigarette lighter and it will automatically power on and off with the car.
customer_reviews.author: Suji

customer_reviews.title: High Endurance and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it February 26, 2018. It was a bit tricky to tune it but with a little research got it just right. -Does its job and does it well. Easy to see even at bright daylight. -HIGH ENDURANCE: I live in AZ, 116 degrees+ outside temps, about 2 years now, works as when new!. 5 Stars!.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: skip it, buggy unit
customer_reviews.text: instructions are hard to follow, my unit never could hook up to gps, so is a useless box.
customer_reviews.author: runner

customer_reviews.title: It works OK but the connection is a little flaky ...
customer_reviews.text: It works OK but the connection is a little flaky. I stopped using it because it's too bright at night.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Young

customer_reviews.title: It's a waist of resources...
customer_reviews.text: Wife and son couldn't to work in her car.2018. Try it in my truck. Tracking is severely off. 5 to 10 mph off. And it constantly go up and down. Is not worth the time or $$.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Junk, cannot get it to set properly. Plug and Play, what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: having the display for him to easily see at eye view level
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this for my husband who's only complaint with his new car is that the display is not on his dash so I thought this would fix that issue, having the display for him to easily see at eye view level. Affordable fix to his issue.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: ... as it's not measuring the tire size and rotation like your vehicle does
customer_reviews.text: not 100% accurate as it's not measuring the tire size and rotation like your vehicle does, but I have learned what the difference is based on my acceleration.I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Works well and I'm impressed with its ability to accurately ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I'm impressed with its ability to accurately display speed and my country's highway speed limit, however it can be a bit blinding when the sun's reflexion hit it.
customer_reviews.author: marcus21

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Speed is off about 4 mph once you get up past 45mph but for the price it does a much better job than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was sure that this heads up display will also indicate the road a head but I guess I didn't notice that it's only a speedometer gps. I gave to give it a 5 stars because it's accurate and the value is great considering the low price tag. I will give it as a present 🎁 to my brother though Have no use in it
customer_reviews.author: DANA SHAUL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected -- I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product but has ended up being useless to me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product but has ended up being useless to me. it failed to convert from kilometres to miles. when i called amazon about it, i never got help. i lost that money
customer_reviews.author: Stratus Mushabe

customer_reviews.title: Number seems to have small delay. But work as ...
customer_reviews.text: Number seems to have small delay. But work as said in product page. You can see the numbers clearly under day light.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy C.

customer_reviews.title: This will make a good car
customer_reviews.text: every car should have these. This will make a good car great
customer_reviews.author: mud

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item. There were no directions with ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. There were no directions with it on how to hook it up or use it. I was looking for a compass not a speedometer. This seemed to be mostly a speedometer. Believe it or not, my car already has a speedometer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: At best it is a speed sensor and it gives a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a GPS! At best it is a speed sensor and it gives a warning if you go over a speed that you set. Such a waste
customer_reviews.author: L. Macomber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't read properly
customer_reviews.text: The unit I got read 12MPH over the speed limit, this makes it WAY to hard to judge speed and you are still looking at the speedometer, the reason for having this unit. The PGS directions does not work aka it would say N all the time but I was traveling south.... I wanted to like this, but the lack of proper instruction (had to youtube it) and than not properly reading it was just a reflective lamp on my dash at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Not practic!
customer_reviews.text: It's not chargeable, I does not work without a cable which is annoying because you will have always a cable hanging from the dash, and has no set up or installing instructions, never used it, returned inmediatelty
customer_reviews.author: Juan Emilio Ycaza E

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice concept, but the dependency of the battery all ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. Although, it is a nice concept, but the dependency of the battery all the time, makes it a difficult choice to use on a regular basis. You need to find a free cigarette lighter to keep this thing plug in.
customer_reviews.author: a3d

customer_reviews.title: not 24V!
customer_reviews.text: On the listing it stated, 12/24V. They lied. My car is 24V. The instructions clearly state 18V max. rude!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box, I noticed that the speed ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, I noticed that the speed over 50 mph was off slightly but it's adjustable and once done, it's then accurate.
customer_reviews.author: joaklay

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Replacement for an Inaccurate Mechanical Speedometer
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my '79 Triumph Spitfire... that's a small, British sports car. Over the last forty years, from changing transmissions, wheels and differentials, the mechanical speedometer had become very inaccurate. For $35, this is a nice alternative to the $200 replacements that match the appearance of the mechanicals.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy in Danville, Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty cool, can be a bit fickle at times but for the price, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Costello

customer_reviews.title: Window film was warped and won't stick to windshield cleaned ...
customer_reviews.text: Window film was warped and won't stick to windshield cleaned window and film several times and even applied soap and water with credit card and still won't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Our Healthy World

customer_reviews.title: It's working
customer_reviews.text: The speed calculation for this is spot on. The installation was easy, and not hard to figure out. The compass on it is also accurate. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

product_meta.title: DODORO 3.5 Inch Head-Up Display,LED Speedometer, Color Projection, Speed Warning, A2 ECU, Powered By USB Port Or Cigarette Lighter,No OBD/OBD2 Restriction, Compatible With All Cars and Trucks
product_meta.description:
Dial wheel use method: 
Dial wheel, used for setting, you can dial up, dial down or vertical press to set related parameters. (When dial wheel in the left) 
Long Vertical press:press for 5 seconds,enter into setting mode. 
There're 6 items to set.After adjustment,Long Vertical press for 5 seconds to save your setting and exsit. 
Short Vertical press:in turn display 6 items setting,they are speed,speeding warning,brightness,speed unit, 
the voltage of hud anto power off and read mode. 
Short Dial Up:Increase the parameter value when in setting mode 
Short Dial Down:Reduce parameter values when in setting mode 

HUD Setting 
Let's take rpm unit switch setting for example. 
a.Long vertical press the dial wheel for 5 seconds enter into setting mode. 
b.Dial up and down to select setting item,there're 6 items for setting( you'll see the lights on at the bottom.“1” is speed，“2” is speeding warning，“3” is another speeding value warning,“4” is brightness adjustment，“5” speed unit switch.，“6” is factory reset. ) 
c.So we just choose the “5” item speed unit item,then dial up and down the dial wheel,adjust your right speed unit value. 
d.Long vertical press the dial wheel for 5 seconds to save and exist. 

Product Parameters: 
Work Voltage: DC8-18-24V 
Work Current: 40mA 
Static Current: 15mA 
Electronic compass accuracy: ±1° 
Speed range:0-400KM 
Item size: 90x54x12mm 
Item weight: 40g 

Package Includes: 
1 x A2 HUD 
1 x Cigarette Lighter connect Cable 
1 x Reflecting Film 
1 x Anti-slip Pad 
1 x English User Manual
feature_bullets: ✔For all cars. Our HUD is different from other OBD2 HUD displays. It collects data via the car’s A2 ECU. The HUD’s built-in GPS signal-receiving module can calculate your driving speed and offer you real — more accurate — data;

✔It has a 3.5-inch, multi-color LED. It can produce a large font and has an auto/manual brightness adjustment. The screen surface uses nanotechnology to eliminate excess light reflection, making it easy to read even during daytime;

✔The unit has a simple design. Instead of presenting complicated information, it only displays the most important measurements, such as driving speed (km/h, mph), speed-limit warning and directions. It does not interfere with your view. The unit also automatically powers on and off with your car, so it will not run down your battery. It also has a convenient manual on/off switch;
✔Plug & Play. It is powered by the DC8-24V cigarette lighter and is compatible with all cars and trucks;
✔ Item from DODORO,make sure you choose DOODORO's no worries purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars40 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
